results.content:
A very interesting tutorial, covers the basics steps to authenticate and make authenticated requests.
Each lesson is clearly explained and addresses a specific topic.
results.content_html:
A very interesting tutorial, covers the basics steps to authenticate and make authenticated requests.
Each lesson is clearly explained and addresses a specific topic.

results.content: I liked it, it served as an overview on the subject. Explanations are accelerated and in some classes make understanding difficult. Some conflicts, especially in the authentication part discouraged me.
results.content_html: I liked it, it served as an overview on the subject. Explanations are accelerated and in some classes make understanding difficult. Some conflicts, especially in the authentication part discouraged me.

results.content:
Yes this has been very helpful in explaining how the authentication part works, for the WordPress REST API.
I would like my client program to access my WordPress custom endpoints I have made in my custom plugin.
results.content_html:
Yes this has been very helpful in explaining how the authentication part works, for the WordPress REST API.
I would like my client program to access my WordPress custom endpoints I have made in my custom plugin.

results.content: This should have been done in React or Angular. All this time spent on setting login buttons and logout buttons and login forms and logout forms is not relevant to developers today who most are React or Angular developers.
results.content_html: This should have been done in React or Angular. All this time spent on setting login buttons and logout buttons and login forms and logout forms is not relevant to developers today who most are React or Angular developers.

results.content: Similar rating to other course. This really didn't need to be a course all on its own. And should be one course explaining everything. He has another course on the Wordpress REST API and it is just as average.
results.content_html: Similar rating to other course. This really didn't need to be a course all on its own. And should be one course explaining everything. He has another course on the Wordpress REST API and it is just as average.

results.content: Great, but could've been a little slower paced with a little emphasis on ES6 coding ...
results.content_html: Great, but could've been a little slower paced with a little emphasis on ES6 coding ...
